mapper.sql: SELECT memberNo, id, password, role, name, postCode, address, email, phone, kidNum, kidAge, kidAge1, kidAge2, kidAge3, field, fieldCd, kakaoToken, STATUS, enrollDate, modifyDate, address2 FROM MEMBER
mapper.select: WHERE NAME = #{name} AND EMAIL = #{email} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( memberNo, id, password, role, name, postCode, address, email, phone, kidNum, kidAge, kidAge1, kidAge2, kidAge3, field, fieldCd, kakaoToken, STATUS, enrollDate, modifyDate, address2 ) VALUES ( 0, #{id}, #{password}, #{role}, #{name}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{kidNum}, #{kidAge}, 0, 0, 0, #{field}, #{fieldCd}, #{kakaoToken}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{address2})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, POSTCODE = #{postCode}, ADDRESS = #{address}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, KIDNUM = #{kidNum}, KIDAGE = #{kidAge}, KIDAGE1 = 0, KIDAGE2 = 0, KIDAGE3 = 0, FIELD = #{field}, FIELDCD = #{fieldCd}, MODIFYDATE = #{modifyDate} WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
